EmailTemplate.name: SLX Questionnaire
EmailTemplate.subject: Questionnaire Form For Web Content Package
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi ,
Thank you for joining SponsoredLinX!
Please complete the questionnaire form for the web content package via the below URL. http://bjbglobal.force.com/questionnaireSLX?accId={!SFDC_Projects__c.AccountId__c}&projectId={!SFDC_Projects__c.Id}
Regards, SponsoredLinx Sales Team
